name: Pillow VR
description:
Discover an entirely new way to use your headset with Pillow, the ONLY immersive app designed to be used lying down!

Relax in bed in mixed reality as you experience four amazing interactive dreams, all playable in singleplayer or 2-player co-op!

-- STARGAZE as your ceiling transforms into an interactive night sky. Grab each of the 88 constellations from the sky to learn their mythology or explore each as a relaxing soundbath creating music with the stars.

-- FISH from your ceiling in this gravity-twist to fishing as you hunt for voice messages left by other players in unique, ever-changing daily ponds.

-- MEDITATE and create worlds with the power of your breath in this one-of-a-kind breath-tracked experience that will transform your reality.

-- PLAY interactive bedtime stories with hundreds of unique endings while making choices that change everything along the way.

-- SHARE YOUR BED virtually with a friend and relax together in a social MR experience unlike anything else.

Pillow is updated regularly with free content updates, so make sure to check back for more cool free stuff!
